scripts.init-data: start pnpm run serve-pocket && pnpm run ts-build && node server/dist/script/database_init.mjs
scripts.allocate: start pnpm run serve-pocket && pnpm run ts-build && node server/dist/script/allocate.mjs
scripts.dev: SET NODE_ENV=development && start pnpm run serve-pocket & start pnpm run serve-express
scripts.start: vite build client && SET NODE_ENV=production && start pnpm run serve-pocket && start pnpm run serve-express
